relatedProjects.title: SoundInk
relatedProjects.description: Web application that sonifies drawings using React and Web Audio API for therapeutic and educational experiences.
relatedProjects.relevance: Inspired our approach to real-time audio generation and interactive drawing interfaces.

relatedProjects.title: The Deckle Project
relatedProjects.description: Interactive drawing interface that explores the relationship between visual mark-making and sound generation.
relatedProjects.relevance: Inspired our approach to real-time drawing-to-sound translation on a wooden board.
